pluginstrument.author: K. Scott Tripp
pluginstrument.description:
PA28-181 Arrow II dual ASI. Includes grey and transparent backgrounds. The scales on both the IAS and TAS cards may need work.
Tested on X-Plane, but may work with FSX or Preapr3D.
Based on the PA-28R-201 Arrow III ASI from Florian Kleinau (in turn based on one from Russ Green). https://github.com/kstripp-airmanager/pa28-181-asi
